CustomField.description: Set this field to true to mark the record as active and make it available for use in RollUpPro Jobs. If set to false or left unchecked, the record remains inactive and is excluded from use.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set this field to true to mark the record as active and make it available for use in RollUpPro Jobs. If set to false or left unchecked, the record remains inactive and is excluded from use.
CustomField.label: Active?
